channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 9th October
item.description:
15DB Overgrown Tree CW Road closure TM Outside Woodstock Cut off low branches (Overgrown Tree)

item.title: Paint on Pavement from resurfacing, 9th October
item.description:
Fairview Rd has recently been resurfaced which is great however the pavements for the entire length of the road are now covered in spray paint markings from the construction. Theses markings should of been cleaned up by the contractors.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairview Court, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Pedestrian crossing between Sandford Parks takes very long to change, 9th October
item.description:
The Toucan Crossing takes minutes to change. For such a short crossing, this seems unnecessary. The timings with the London Road crossroads further down don't seem to line up either.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
